definition: capable of being moved or conveyed from one place to another, personal as opposed to real property
details:
adjective
- capable of being moved or conveyed from one place to another
= synonyms: transferable
- (of personal property as opposed to real estate) can be moved from place to place (especially carried by hand)
noun
- personal as opposed to real property
= example: personal as opposed to real property
= synonyms: chattel, personal chattel
